projects.title: Dev Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Personal Portfolio Website developed in React.
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - UI Component: Home Page, Experience Page, Projects Page, About Me, and Contact Me.

projects.title: Smart Project Management
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a business management application for Bosch Rexroth's sales units and partners.
 - Designed and integrated three different dashboards for Admin, SalesUnit, and Partners. 
 - Implemented Single sign-on authentication system, RESTful APIs for database interactions, and Business Intelligence in web applications.

projects.title: Recommendation Engine
projects.bodyText:
- Automatically filtered and analyzed customers data and recommend relevant products to them.
 - Customers can review and puchased products by using 3D Models, Datasheets and Spare Part sheets attached with the recommended products. 
 - Integrated closed feedback loop with recommended products list.

projects.title: Virtual Streaming Platform
projects.bodyText:
- Designed responsive and user friendly Streaming Platform (VSP) for conferences and virtual live events with global partners.
 - Features of VSP: Information about live conferences and speakers, Chatbot features with live streaming from Bosch Tube server, Photo gallery and beekast photo uploading features.

projects.title: Map Selector
projects.bodyText:
- Designed Product Selector tool for identifying and searching details of Bosch Rexroth's materials.
 - Automatically changing searching pattern and links based on the customers locations.

projects.title: Carmela & Service Center
projects.bodyText:
- Designed and integrated different functionalities of Admin, Car seller, Customers, and Visitors modules.
 - Customers can view, filter, and purchased old car directly from car dealers. 
 - Implemented seprate modules for car service centers.

projects.title: Tech Craft Solution
projects.bodyText:
- Designed and developed web application for Tech Craft Solution company, India.
 - Users can log in with email address and password.
 - Users can see services and get information about company.
